title: Womens Dress V Neck

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering style.
items.body: I am a woman of "a certain age." Not a small woman either... I usually wear a USA size L/XL. I ordered the XL, as I never know how things are sized and didn't want it too small, but could have worn a large. The material is 60% Polyester, 35% Cotton, 5% Spandex. I wish it had more cotton in it, but that's just my personal preference. The polyester keeps this from shrinking in the wash, and it doesn't wrinkle, making it perfect for packing in a suitcase for vacations. (I had laundered this before wearing it.) The fabric is a lightweight, silky, knit material, but is heavy enough not to be sheer or see-thru. The vee neck, 3/4 length sleeves, and shirt tail hem detailing along with the buttons at the bust, add style and look slimming when worn. Even my husband who never notices anything said this shirt made me look thinner! The price at the time I selected this was $19.99 with a coupon special price of $14.99. This shirt is a bargain! Buy it now! You won't be disappointed. Read more
items.author: Janelle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nicer Than I Expected
items.body: I took a chance on this shirt. I wasn't sure if the size chart referred to me or the garment. I went with my hunch and decided it was the measurement of the garment. I normally wear a L but got an XL after measuring a favorite top in my closet. It turned out to be a good decision. Although if you examine the shirt it is very simply sewn, the material, which has a lightweight polyester/bamboo feel, still gives it a drape, and the pattern hides the absence of any real styling. It skims the body without clinging to it. The length falls to the hips, just like on the model. The sleeves are 3/4 on me, but could be a little shorter on someone with long arms. Mine are short and sleeves tend to be longish on me. The buttons are just decoration down the center, with no buttonhole. I washed this in a cold water wash and dried it on the permanent press setting. I was pleased with how it came out. It did not shrink, fade, or deform in any way. The seams stayed strong. There were no wrinkles at all. The pattern was a good choice. The colors are bright but not primary. The patchwork disguises the simplicity of how it is sewn. I think the solid would not fair as well in that department. In all it is, while definitely not a fine piece of clothing, it is well worth the price. It is easy to care for. It looks cute. Read more
items.author: Shea1114

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Simple Go-To Top
items.body: This AKEWEI top is comfortable and runs true to size. The cut is more of a traditional cut, so it is not as relaxed in the shoulders and arms as I was expecting. It's not tight, it's just cut a little closer to the body than a relaxed silhouette cut would be. The sleeves hit me mid-forearm, so it is definitely a 3/4 sleeve shirt. The print was nicely done with no smeared or blobby spots. The material is soft, and does have a bit of a synthetic feel. This shirt washed well on cold and I hung it to dry with no problems or wrinkling. It's very packable for trips/vacations. The length is a tunic length, and the top was not flowy and loose, but also not snug or tight. Just a nice top to have in the closet that's comfortable and looks good. Read more
items.author: BettyB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and casual top
items.body: This isn't a bad little top. I'm not sure how I feel about the print that I chose; I got the brown plaid. It has sort of an empire waistline that peaks slightly in the middle, under the bust. It has 3 little wood-look buttons on the front for some interest. The front is gathered and flowy. It has a very casual vibe and would pair well with jeans. The fabric is pretty lightweight. If wearing in colder weather, you'll probably want an undershirt. I weigh between 150-155 lbs, stand 5' 7" tall, with a 36" bust, 32" waist, and 41" hips. I ordered a medium. Read more
items.author: OtakuKitteh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, flattering and an instant favorite.
items.body: Love the true red color and the fabric is very soft. It is very well constructed and the stitching is very well sewn and growing up seeing a seamstress I notice all those details because they are important to ensure that it is a piece that will endure normal wear and will not have loose threads unravel at the hems when you wash and dry. The detail of the buttons in the front elevate the style and it is very flaterring on any type of body (in my case it hides the extra tummy weight). Excellent value and great color for the holiday season. Read more
items.author: Arlenepr

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Comfortable Top
items.body: This 3/4 sleeve babydoll top is really flattering and comfortable to wear. The V-neck and peplum style give it a nice dressy-casual look that works well for work, weekends, or fall outings. The fabric feels soft and lightweight, and the fit is true to size without being too tight. it’s a lovely, easy-to-style top that looks great with jeans or leggings. A nice addition to my fall wardrobe! Read more
items.author: DJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flowy, Feminine, and Fall-Ready
items.body: This top has such a pretty vibe — the navy floral pattern feels bright without being overwhelming, and the babydoll cut gives it that easy, flowy drape that’s super forgiving and flattering. The 3/4 sleeves are great for transitional weather, and it’s long enough to wear with leggings but still cute tucked into jeans. The material is lightweight, comfy, and perfect for casual workdays or weekend errands. It’s a very “grab and go but still looks cute” kind of shirt, and I love how feminine it feels without being fussy. Definitely a staple for my fall wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Kenz

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s okay,
items.body: This babydoll top runs a little wide. It looks really pretty in the photos but in person it looks cheaply made with my buttons being scratched up and tarnished. Read more
items.author: Angela

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy Blue Pink Floral, Red, Brown Plaid, Green White Print, Apricot Red Floral, Blue Leaves, Black, Blue Bohemain, Black Blue Floral, Black Apricot Floral, Orange and Blue Plaid, Blue White Stripes. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
